definitions: (of a project, activity, etc.) provided with funding by a particular organization or body

examples.text: in the past, sponsored research made up two-thirds of the budget
a government-sponsored report on urban regeneration

definitions: denoting a fundraising event or activity in which each participant obtains promises from sponsors to donate a certain amount of money for the participant's completion of the activity

examples.text: he's gearing up to take part in a 14-mile sponsored walk to raise money for a local animal charity

shortDefinitions: denoting fundraising activity in which participants obtain promises to donate money on completion of activity
